The converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见的转换类型是与字符串对象的相互转换。The most common types to convert are to and from a string object. 默认实现调用对象的方法的对象是否有效且目标类型为字符串。The default implementation calls the object's method if the object is valid and if the destination type is string. 如果此方法无法转换为目标类型，则会引发异常。If this method cannot convert to the destination type, it throws a exception.

span.span: The conversion cannot be completed.
